answer:
QUESTION

In wudhu will on make khilaal of the toes once after having washed both feet or will one wash the right foot then make khilaal thereafter wash the left foot and make khilaal?

ANSWER


Share:

The khilaal of the toes will be made after washing each foot respectively.

And Allah Knows Best
